name: Team AHHH - Guide Dog (Collab Jam 2021)
description:
Guide Dog is a game that requires cooperation. The blind human player goes through puzzle rooms while the other player illuminates the crates the player needs to navigate through.

Sadly really wanted the networking elements to work, and while it works on the same machine, instances don't seem to work over multiple machines, despite accounting for latency. I'm sure we're one bug away from completion, sadly we ran out of time.
